column4: i'm installing 11.10 and set to replace existing 10.10. i get a fatal error "executing 'grub-install /dev/sda' failed".  geez! help

i'm not upgrading. i choose install from cdrom.  then during install, it asked if i wanted to replace the 10.10 vs replacing my 10.10 and windows. so i figure just replace the 10.10 partition. but got this error
thats not a good omen for 11.10
it is always as bad, as you want it to be :-)
